author: R. Prasad
title: Silent spread of novel coronavirus in Italy went undetected for weeks
description: By the time the first case was reported, the virus had already spread to most areas in southern Lombardy
content: Italy reported its first laboratory-confirmed case of novel coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) on February 20. But according to a study posted in a preprint repository arXiv, people appear to have been infected in early January and started showing symptoms by January 1… [+2879 chars]
